Name: Ersatz Balloon: Whispering Breeze
Desc: A most curious hot air balloon that has used the Floral Chess pieces from the Windblume Festival as their point of reference, this one shaped like one of the Anemo Slimes attached to a Windwheel Aster Basket.\nIt is said that Anemo Slimes will make a special huffing noise as they take flight, but since most do not have the opportunity to see an Anemo Slime in such a state, this rumor has not been properly substantiated...
Source: Learned from Realm Depot Furnishing Blueprint
